d.f: ￹￺out of joint * dislocated from the joint so that the end hangs loose￻折斷，踹斷，脫臼，斷層

e: ￹`Ma~`peca'~ `ko~ `kamay~.￺The lower arm hangs loose at the elbow.￻手折斷，手脫臼
￹`Aka~ `pi~`peca'~ `to~ `ca'ang~ `no~ `kilang~.￺Don't break loose the tree branch (at the joint).￻不要折樹枝
d.f: ￹￺referring to people or things￻指人或事物
